Headline: #18 16th-18th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Roosevelt/Michigan
ShortDescription: EB 18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, State, 11th, Wabash & Roosevelt, due to street blockage near Roosevelt/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, State, 11th, Wabash & Roosevelt, due to street blockage near Roosevelt/Michigan.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #26 South Shore Express & #30 South Chicago Temporary Reroute at Ewing/95th
ShortDescription: 26 South Shore Express & 30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Ewing, 95th, Ave L, 100th & Ewing, due to street blockage near Ewing/95th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#26 South Shore Express & #30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ewing, 95th, Ave L, 100th & Ewing, due to street blockage near Ewing/95th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Reroute at 55th/Western
ShortDescription: 55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, Western, 51st, California and 55th, due to street blockage near 55th/Western

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 55th, Western, 51st, California and 55th, due to street blockage near 55th/Western

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State Temporary Southbound Reroute near 79th/Lafayette
ShortDescription: SB 29 State buses are temp. rerouted via Lafayette, 79th, Vincennes, 83rd, Lafayette, then resume their normal route due to police activity at 79th/Lafayette.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

  • Southbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Lafayette, 79th, Vincennes, 83rd, Lafayette, then resume their normal route due to police activity at 79th/Lafayette.
  • Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute near 79th/Lafayette
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses temp. rerouted EB via 79th, Vincennes, 83rd, State & 79th;WB via 79th, King drive, 76th, Vincennes & 79th due to police activity 79th/Lafayette.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to police activity at 79th/Lafayette.

  • Eastbound buses will operate via 79th, Vincennes, 83rd, State, then resume their normal route on 79th.
  • Westbound buses will operate via 79th, King drive, 76th, Vincennes, then resume their normal route on 79th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #75 74th/75th Temporary Reroute near 79th/Lafayette
ShortDescription: 75 74th/75th buses rtd EB via 75th, Lafayette, then resume on 75th; WB via 75th, State, then resume on 75th due to police activity near 79th/Lafayette.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#75 74th/75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to police activity at 79th/Lafayette.

  • Eastbound buses will operate via 75th, Lafayette, then resume their normal route on 75th.
  • Westbound buses will operate via 75th, State, then resume their normal route on 75th.

Allow extra travel time.
